full_summary:
=====================================================

**Government Tender Announcement**
--------------------------------

### Title

*   French: 5P414-220128 - Bateaux
*   English: 5P414-220128 - Boats

### Notice Information

*   **Reference Number**: WS3630424669-Doc3658251847
*   **Publication Date**: September 26, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date**: October 25, 2022 at 2:00 PM (Local Time)

### Opportunity Information

*   **Location**: Fort Smith
*   **Contracting Agency**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
	+   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
	+   City: Gatineau
	+   Province: Quebec
	+   Postal Code: K1A 0S5
	+   Country: Canada

### Tender Information

*   **Commodity**: Marine Transport
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
*   **Eligibility**: All bids must comply with the trade agreements listed above.
*   **Bid Opening**: The bid opening and evaluation process will be closed on October 25, 2022 at 2:00 PM (local time).

### Contact Information

*   **Bidder's Representative**: Jim Stoesz
*   **Email**: jim.stoesz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Apply Now**
-------------

To respond to this tender, please contact Jim Stoesz at jim.stoesz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. For any inquiry, please don't hesitate to email or call the contact person above.

Note:
-----

The response deadline is firm. Late bids will not be accepted. Bids must be on the official bid form and must not be altered or changed once submitted. We will not accept any exceptions or deviations to the terms of this notice.

### General Information

Bids are invited to supply marine transport services to the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) for use by the Parks Canada Agency (PC).

Note to the Bidders:
-------------------
